lines.text:
[after sentencing Hugh Tallant to a 50-lash whipping]
I don't want any danger of infection. Have you the salt ready for his wounds?
Mr. Green, you will make preparations for keelhauling the prisoners.
Captain Gilbert, no man has been keelhauled on an English ship for fifty years.
Oh, I don't think it's been that long.
I'd rather be a free man running than the most comfortable slave in the world.
